title: Foundry Command Palette Commands
description: Schema for registering commands in the Foundry Command Palette.

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: Pointer to the schema against which this document should be validated.

commands.title: Commands
commands.description: Array of commands to register in the Foundry Command Palette.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique id of the command. E.g. `open-settings", `open-macros`

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the command. E.g. `Open Settings`, `Open Macros`

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the command. E.g. `Opens the settings window`

exec.title: Exec
exec.description: Command to execute when the command is clicked. Or unique id of the command to execute. The Id will be used to look up the command in the `CONFIG.fcp.commandFns` object. E.g. `(name) => game.actors.getName(name).sheet.render(true)`, `openMacros`

getMatchString.title: Get String Match
getMatchString.description: (Optional): Function to get the string to match against when searching for the command. If not provided, the title will be used. E.g. `(string) => string.toLowerCase()`

items.title: Argument
items.description: Argument required for the command. E.g. `actor-name`, `macro-id`
